howItWorks.title: From Photo to AR in Minutes
howItWorks.subtitle: Forget expensive 3D studios. SpaceCheck makes AR accessible for every retailer.

1.title: 1. Upload Product Photos
1.desc: Simply upload your existing high-quality product images. No complex 3D scanning equipment required.

2.title: 2. AI Generates 3D Model
2.desc: Our advanced AI analyzes geometry and textures to reconstruct a photorealistic 3D model in seconds.

3.title: 3. Embed AR Viewer
3.desc: Copy a simple code snippet to your product page. Customers can now view the item in their room instantly.

omnichannel.title: Bridge the Gap: In-Store to At-Home
omnichannel.subtitle: Don't lose customers who walk out of your showroom to 'measure their room'. Give them the tool to visualize instantly.
omnichannel.feature1Desc: SpaceCheck automatically creates ready-to-print QR posters for every product in your catalog.
omnichannel.feature2Desc: Customers scan the label in-store and can immediately see if the furniture fits their home space.
omnichannel.imageCaption: Actual print-ready PDF generated by SpaceCheck

demo.title: Experience it yourself
demo.subtitle: Scan the QR code to see how a potential customer would view the 'Table Bach' in their own space.
demo.step1Desc: Point your phone's camera at the QR code.
demo.step2Desc: Click the banner that appears to launch the AR viewer.
demo.step3Desc: Move your phone slightly to detect the floor and place the object.

enterprise.name: Enterprise

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about integrating AR into your store.
faq.q1: Do I need a 3D scanner to use SpaceCheck?
faq.a1: No. SpaceCheck uses advanced AI to generate 3D models from standard 2D product photos. You just need a clear image of your furniture piece.
faq.q2: Does it work on iPhone and Android?
faq.a2: Yes. We automatically convert models to USDZ (for iOS QuickLook) and GLB (for Android SceneViewer) to ensure native compatibility on all modern smartphones without requiring an app download.
faq.q3: How do I add this to my online store?
faq.a3: It's as simple as embedding a YouTube video. We provide a short HTML code snippet that you copy and paste into your product page template. It works with Shopify, WooCommerce, Magento, and custom sites.
faq.q4: What happens if the AI model isn't perfect?
faq.a4: Our AI is retrained specifically on furniture datasets for high accuracy. However, you can also manually upload your own 3D files if you already have them, using our viewer for the hosting and AR experience.
faq.q5: Is there a limit to how many people can view the models?
faq.a5: Our Starter plan includes generous bandwidth limits suitable for small stores. Enterprise plans offer unlimited views and global CDN caching for high-traffic retailers.

generator.headerSubtitle: Quick Generator - Create AR QR codes for your models

generator.modelPathSmallText: Enter the GLB model path in format: brand/filename.glb
